# MessagingParams
[Git Source](https://github.com/malda-protocol/malda-lending/blob/157d7bccdcadcb7388d89b00ec47106a82e67e78/src\interfaces\external\layerzero\v2\ILayerZeroEndpointV2.sol)


```solidity
struct MessagingParams {
    uint32 dstEid;
    bytes32 receiver;
    bytes message;
    bytes options;
    bool payInLzToken;
}
```
